programme.title: R.I.P.D
R.I.P.D. Agenti za počivale u miru
programme.desc: R.I.P.D.: Directed by Robert Schwentke. With Jeff Bridges, Ryan Reynolds, Kevin Bacon, Mary-Louise Parker. A recently slain cop joins a team of undead police officers working for the Rest in Peace Department and tries to find the man who murdered him." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0790736/","name":"R.I.P.D.","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM5OTYxNzE5N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDU1MTQ4OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A recently slain cop joins a team of undead police officers working for the Rest in Peace Department and tries to find the man who murdered him.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0790736/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"loyal-on1"},"dateCreated":"2013-07-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"What did you expect?!","reviewBody":"Seen this 5 days ago and I loved it! Don't really understand what the hate is about or whats the deal with the critics and the awful 25 rating on metascore. The movie does what its supposed to,it entertains,its fun,its not heavy,just plain summertime fun. And all the comparisons with MIB?! They ONLY replaced the alien angle with the deados angle,and its not agent K and J,but its ONLY 2 dead guys,and one of them is a Wild West lawman. This has nothing to do with MIB,plus its a better movie than the last two sequels of MIB. And people say they took the rookie/veteran mismatch from MIB,although it was already done in a million different movies before MIB. I know i've mentioned MIB quiet a few times in this review,but all for you to see that it is nothing like it. Go see it and you won't regret it. Jeff Bridges is hilarious and Ryan Reynolds is cool as always. Its fast,its fun,the special effects are great. Do yourself a favor,buy a lot of popcorn,sit back and enjoy the ride!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":125329,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2013-07-19","keywords":"villain,end of the world,gun fu,gunslinger,buddy cop","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"U.S. Version #","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1741202969","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE0MTg3OTM3N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTQ3OTA0OQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE0MTg3OTM3N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTQ3OTA0OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A recently slain cop joins a team of undead police officers working for the Rest in Peace Department and tries to find the man who murdered him."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005351/","name":"Ryan Reynolds"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000313/","name":"Jeff Bridges"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000571/","name":"Mary-Louise Parker"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0777881/","name":"Robert Schwentke"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011134/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0020061/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006534/","name":"Phil Hay"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0542062/","name":"Matt Manfredi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0229694/","name":"David Dobkin"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

Don't really understand what the hate is about or whats the deal with the critics and the awful 25 rating on metascore. The movie does what its supposed to,it entertains,its fun,its not heavy,just plain summertime fun. And all the comparisons with MIB?! They ONLY replaced the alien angle with the deados angle,and its not agent K and J,but its ONLY 2 dead guys,and one of them is a Wild West lawman. This has nothing to do with MIB,plus its a better movie than the last two sequels of MIB. And people say they took the rookie/veteran mismatch from MIB,although it was already done in a million different movies before MIB. I know i've mentioned MIB quiet a few times in this review,but all for you to see that it is nothing like it. Go see it and you won't regret it. Jeff Bridges is hilarious and Ryan Reynolds is cool as always. Its fast,its fun,the special effects are great.
